Cal State LA
5151 State University Dr, Los Angeles, CA 90032

Renewable Hydrogen: 100%

H35 Status
H70 Status
H35 Capacity
H70 Capacity
Station TypeRetail - Open
Development StatusOpen - Legacy Retail
Expected to Open2019-11-20
Fuel Pressure35/70 MPa
Hydrogen SourceElectrolyzer
Opening HoursMonday - Friday, 9am - 5pm
Station OperatorCal State LA
Station WebsiteVisit
This is a legacy retail station with limited performance, capacity, and operating hours. It is recommended as a secondary use station. This station generates hydrogen using an on-site electrolyzer, with an available capacity of about 50 kg. The station may be able to fill up to 16 cars per day with an average fill time ranging from 10 to 15 minutes. Once the hydrogen supply is fully depleted, the station will take about 2-hours to refresh for the next vehicle and may take more than one day to replenish to full capacity.

Station WebsiteVisit
Station Customer Service(800) 224-2724

When the automated system answers, press option 2, then 3, then 2 to connect with the Equipment Support Team.

The UC Irvine Hydrogen Station has been in operation since January 10, 2003, supporting research and fuel cell vehicle development.  It was upgraded over the years, and opened as a retail station in November, 2015, to serve three fundamental purposes: 1) retail sales of fuel, 2) research, and 3) hydrogen bus fueling.
